components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Multiple Networks over Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery failures to multiple networks and countries. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - SMS

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery failures to multiple networks and countries. Our engineers are investigating the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - SMS

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Programmable Messaging. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - SMS

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Reports Delays to Multiple US Network via Subset of Shortcode

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience delivery report delays over SMS to Multiple US Network via Subset of short-codes. Our engineering team is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in delivery report delays over SMS to Multiple US Network via Subset of short-codes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing delivery report delays over SMS to Multiple US Network via Subset of short-codes. SMS delivery is not impacted at the moment. Our engineering team is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Authy and Verify V1 API - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned Global maintenance between 15:00 to 15:30 Pacific Time on 08/03/2024. During the maintenance window, all Authy API requests will fail. Communicate to your customers (end users) about this planned downtime for maintenance before August 3, 2024. Due to Authy APIs deprecation (https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/authy-vs-verify), we strongly encourage migrating to the Verify V2 API. Verify V2 API, specifically SMS/Voice OTP delivery, is unaffected by this maintenance downtime.
